updates.name: Finally got updates working!
updates.content: I finally got the updates working! I'm so happy! This is my own personal website, so I can do whatever I want with it. I'm going to be adding a lot more content to it, so stay tuned!

updates.name: Ways to improve experinence
updates.content: Yes! This is the page I am wanting to improve. For now, it looks rather bland. I'm going to be adding a lot more content to it, so stay tuned!

updates.name: Deployed the updates page
updates.content: I was initially nervous if the updates page would even work, because I did a lot of weird stuff with the swr library and hosted the .json file on github to avoid paying for database hosting

updates.name: Also made a updater script
updates.content: Edit: I rewrote this because I added markdown support for myself and wanted to test if it is actually working. Editing the content everytime was a pain in the json file, so I added a little python magic and made a simple script that you can find [here](https://github.com/newtoallofthis123/About_next/blob/main/updates.py). Quite happy with the result actually.

updates.name: Markdown in updates
updates.content:
Yes! I finally have markdown in the updates. I use a library called [marked.js](https://marked.js.org). It parsed markdown.
and converts it into HTML. So, now, with the power of markdown I can use links and also embed images all in a json file..
So at this point, is it really a json file or a full on database?

links.name: daily.dev gets 11million seed funding
links.content: Yes! daily.dev, the open source developer news aggregator got 11 million in funding! daily.dev is going to be able to grow even more! congrats to them!

links.name: My new updates page is live!
links.content: Yes! I finally got the updates page working! I'm so happy! This is my own personal website, so I can do whatever I want with it. I'm going to be adding a lot more content to it, so stay tuned!
